column4: you can't run the shell without the graphic driver been active. so try to active that while you in classic mode.
i have nVidia Corporation G72 [GeForce 7300 SE/7200 GS] (rev a1) card.After installing the latest proprietary driver from repo ,the shell freezes at start up
zamba:can u say smthng about my problem(or any one else).I have stated it
<reisio>is it going to work for sure?
reisio:i didnt say that(i think) .I have installed shell a few days ago
arghx:i am using the free driver.But the animation is pretty slow
arghx:i am not using any n vidia driver right now, noveaeu
ok....the shell works after installtion,but freezes once the proprietary driver is installed
arghx:i did not install any driver afterwards,i uninstalled the proprietary driver after that and everything works
ok :)..i'll try that out. But isn't the current driver supposed to work ...
arghx:it worked upto 10.10 fine.Facing the problem since 11.04
